extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Up
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: En haut

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Mon dieu...\. what's with this creepy atmosphere?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Mon dieu...\. C'est quoi cette atmosphère effrayante ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: That was part of the point, I think.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'était voulu, je crois.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Whoa, those rhinos were creepy, too!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ouah, même ces rhinos étaient effrayants !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I'm sort of surprised that enemies are still here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je suis un peu surpris que les ennemis soient encore là.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Yes, me too.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui, moi aussi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I suppose this part was hidden well enough, so they just missed them.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je suppose que cette partie était suffisamment bien cachée pour qu'ils les aient ratés.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Can't you just disable them?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Tu peux pas juste les désactiver ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I would rather not.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je préfèrerais pas.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Why?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Pourquoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: We are not allowed to be here, so I would prefer to leave as few traces as possible.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: On est pas autorisé à être ici, donc je préfèrerais laisser le moins de traces possible.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Makes sense...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est logique...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: More creepy enemies, I guess.\. Oh well...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ça veut dire encore plus d'ennemis effrayants...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: What the heck are those?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est quoi ces machins ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: No, not this way...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Non, pas par là...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: To the new meeting room: M04-02.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: À la nouvelle salle de réunion : M04-02.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: That's quite the hallway!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Il est grand ce couloir !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I didn't expect such a huge place.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je ne m'attendais pas à un endroit aussi grand.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It's not as huge as it seems.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est pas aussi grand que ça en à l'air.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Lots of doors with nothing behind them.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est plein de portes avec rien derrière.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Let's have a look around.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Explorons les alentours.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: But then... I found a way to escape.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Mais ensuite... j'ai trouvé un moyen de m'échapper.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: This...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: This was the old meeting room.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'était l'ancienne salle de réunion.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Where I discussed things with Satoshi, Gautham, and Shizuka.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Où j'ai discuté de tas de choses avec Satoshi, Gautham et Shizuka.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Yeah...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: We had a lot of...\. difficult discussions here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: On a eu un tas de...\. discussions difficiles ici.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: This room hasn't been used ever since Satoshi moved back to the old hideout.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Cette salle n'a jamais été utilisée depuis que Satoshi est retourné dans la vieille cachette.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: There's not much to see here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Il n'y a pas grand chose à voir ici.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: ...Yes.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: ... Oui.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: This was my workplace.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'était mon lieu de travail.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: This terminal...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ce terminal...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Here is where I gathered my tasks.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est là où je recueillais mes tâches.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I had a list of targets I had to watch.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: J'avais une liste de cibles que je devais surveiller.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I submitted all the intel I found...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: J'envoyais toutes les informations que je trouvais...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Collaborated with our spies outside the game...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je collaborais avec nos espions en dehors du jeu...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Occasionally I also submitted IDs of additional players to turn into Evotars.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Parfois je soumettais aussi des IDs d'autres joueurs à transformer en Evotars.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Fellow players of our investigation targets, and so forth.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ceux qui jouaient avec nos cibles, et tout.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Having friends around actually helped their memories to return faster.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Avoir des amis à leurs côtés les aidaient pour retrouver la mémoire plus rapidement.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Huh...\. alright?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Euh...\. OK ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: So I might have ended up here as well because of Lea or Lukas?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Donc j'aurais pu aussi me retrouver ici à cause de Lea ou Lukas ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Potentially...\. yes.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Potentiellement...\. oui.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Fortunately, you didn't.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Heureusement, ça n'est pas arrivé.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I remember...\. that I saw a recording in this room.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je me souviens...\. d'avoir vu un enregistrement dans cette pièce.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It seems I can't play it again.\. That's too bad.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: On dirait que je peux pas le rejouer.\. C'est dommage.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: You would have seen my real self.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Vous auriez pu voir mon véritable visage.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: The real Sidwell?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Le vrai Sidwell ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Yes...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I saw it here when my work started.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je l'ai vu ici quand mon travail à commencé.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: A video I recorded for myself.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Une vidéo que j'ai enregistré pour moi-même.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: A reminder for my tasks within the game.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Un rappel de mes tâches à l'intérieur du jeu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Which people I had to interrogate...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Quelles personnes je devais interroger...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Things we already knew about them...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Les choses qu'on savait déjà sur elles...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Why?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Pourquoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Oui, isn't that weird?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui, c'est pas étrange ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: You were just Sidwell playing CrossWorlds, non?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Tu étais juste Sidwell en train de jouer à CrossWorlds, non ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Why remind yourself about that with a video recording?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Pourquoi tu devais te rappeler de tout ça avec un enregistrement vidéo ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I...\. I wasn't just playing CrossWorlds the normal way.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je...\. Je ne jouais pas à CrossWorlds de la manière normale.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I was using a...\. \c[3]special connection\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: J'utilisais une...\. \c[3]connexion spéciale\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Playing the game...\. \c[3]continuously\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je jouais au jeu...\. \c[3]en continu\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Or...\. was I...?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ou... ? Est-ce que c'était bien vrai... ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Thank you for your contribution.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Merci beaucoup pour votre contribution.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Ahhhhhh!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ahhhhhh !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Tronny!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Tronny !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Saw it again...\. that person...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: ... Je l'ai encore vue...\. cette personne...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Just...\. breathe slowly or something, okay?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Essaye...\. euh...\. de respirer lentement, OK ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: This is frustrating...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est frustrant...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Meet...\. where?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Rencontrer...\. Où ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Huh?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Hein ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Right...\. You said you met that person in Evotarground.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui...\. Tu disais que tu as rencontré cette personne sur le Terrain des Évotars.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Was it in this room?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'était dans cette pièce ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: No...\. It was somewhere else.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Non...\. C'était ailleurs.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Right, I remember!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui, je m'en souviens !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Section unlocked.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Section déverrouillée.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: That room is not accessible by default.\. I just opened it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Cette salle n'est pas accessible par défaut.\. Je viens de l'ouvrir.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Let's go there!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Allons-y !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: The message I recorded for myself...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ce message, que je me suis enregistré pour moi-même...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It told me about a prolonged playing session.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Il me parlait d'une session de jeu prolongée.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: That I used a special connection to the game.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Que j'utilisais une connexion spéciale au jeu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: And that my memory would be fuzzy because of it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Et que ma mémoire serait floue à cause de ça.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I...\. just accepted it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je...\. j'y ai cru.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: And did as I told myself.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Et j'ai fais ce que je me suis dit.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Days and weeks went by...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Des jours et des semaines passèrent...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Spying on other players.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: À espionner d'autres joueurs.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Sending intel, coordinating interrogations.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: À envoyer des renseignements, à coordonner des interrogatoires.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: But as my memory returned,\. I realized...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Mais lorsque ma mémoire revenait,\. Je me suis rendu compte...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: That I was Sidwell no longer.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Que je n'étais plus Sidwell.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: That I was stuck in the game.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Que j'étais coincé dans le jeu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I...\. myself...\. was an Evotar.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Que...\. moi-même...\. j'étais un Évotar.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: And I was working...\. for Sidwell.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Et que je travaillais...\. pour Sidwell.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Let me have a look.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Laissez-moi regarder.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Yes...\. it's still here. My \c[3]former user id\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui...\. il est toujours là. Mon \c[3]ancien ID utilisateur\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It was on the day that Lea escaped from Evotarground.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'était le jour où Lea s'est échappée du Terrain des Évotars.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: That day...\. really changed everything.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ce jour...\. a vraiment tout changé.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It seemed like the whole interrogation business was bound to break down.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Il semblait que le programme d'interrogatoire entier était sur le point de tomber à l'eau.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: And Lea's reappearance strongly hinted toward an elaborate mission to find and rescue Satoshi.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Et que la réapparition de Lea était un indice sérieux qu'une mission ingénieuse se préparait pour retrouver et récupérer Satoshi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: To achieve that... they'd have to secure the Evotarserver.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Pour y arriver... il faudrait qu'ils sécurisent le serveur des Évotars.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: And potentially... save all the Evotars on it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Et potentiellement... sauvegarder tous les Évotars.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Unfortunately...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Malheureusement...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Sidwell's Evotars, as I would eventually recall, have been stored on a separate server.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: J'ai fini par me rappeler que les Évotars de Sidwell étaient stockés sur un serveur séparé.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Hardly anyone even knew about it, so its data was likely to be lost.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Quasiment personne le savait, donc ses données seraient sans doute perdues.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: So...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Donc...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: In order to have any chance of being rescued...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Pour que j'ai la moindre chance d'être sauvé...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I'd have to migrate to the main Evotarserver.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Il fallait que je migre vers le Serveur des Évotars principal.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: And there was just one way to do that.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Et il y avait qu'un seul moyen d'y arriver.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: To create a \c[3]new Evotar\c[0]...\. based on myself.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Il fallait que je crée un \c[3]nouvel Évotar\c[0]...\. basé sur moi-même.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I honestly wasn't sure if it would even work.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Honnêtement, je n'étais même pas sûr si ça fonctionnerait.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I just did it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je l'ai juste fait.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I submitted my own user id as a potential interrogation target.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: J'ai soumis mon propre ID utilisateur comme cible potentielle pour un interrogatoire.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Fortunately without Sidwell taking any notice.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Heureusement, sans que Sidwell ne s'en aperçoive.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: And thus...\. a new Evotar was created.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Et donc...\. un nouvel Évotar fut crée.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: And that's who I am.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Et c'est ce que je suis.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: That is why I'm still here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est pour ça que je suis encore là.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Wait...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Attends...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Wait, wait, wait....
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Attends, attends, attends...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: So you're an Evotar...\. of an Evotar...\. of Sidwell?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Donc tu es un Évotar...\. d'un Évotar...\. de Sidwell ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: That's right.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui, c'est ça.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: What.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Quoi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: No...\. no way.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Non...\. C'est pas possible...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Dice mages?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Des magiciens de dés ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Funny dice mage...\. annoying to punch, though.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Curieux ces magiciens de dés...\. Et difficiles à cogner.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: But there was nothing I could do about it... so I just played along.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Mais je ne pouvais rien y faire... donc j'ai joué le jeu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I suppose this is usually what we clones did.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: J'imagine que c'est ce que les clones faisaient habituellement.
